column2: "Woyinom nye asɔfo na Levifo a wɔnye Zerubabel
column4: na Jesua sii mu kɔree no: Seraia

column5: Jedaia. Woyinom nye asɔfo no na hɔn nuanom no mu etsitsir wo Jesua nda mu."

column7: na Mattania a ɔhwɛ ndaasema no do

column3: hɔn nuanom na wodzi hɔn tsentsendo wɔ ɔweɔn no mu."

column2: "Na Joiakim ne nda mu asɔfo no
column3: egyanom efiefi etsitsir no nye yi: Seraia dze

column8: na wɔkyerɛɛw egyanom efiefi etsitsir no: na asɔfo no so wɔ Persianyi Darius n’ahendzi no mu."

column4: wɔkyerɛɛw no wɔ Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu araa dze bodur Eliasib ba Johanan ne nda no mu."

column6: ɔnye hɔn nuanom a wodzii hɔn tsentsendo
column7: dɛ woyi ayɛw na wɔda ase
column8: dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn ne nyimpa David ne mbrasɛm no tse
na wɔyɛ mbobowano ahwɛfo wɔ nkuropon ano ndzekoradze adan no mu."

column2: "Na Jerusalɛm afasu no no mbueidapa no
column3: wɔhwehwɛɛ Levifo no wɔ hɔn tsenabew nyinara
column5: ma wɔdze ndaasema na ɔnye ndwom

column2: "Na adwontofomba no boaboaa hɔn ano hyiaa fi tɛtɛr a abɔ Jerusalɛm ho aprɔw no mu

column3: na Geba nkwaado na Azmavet; osiandɛ adwontofo no akyekyer nkuroba ama hɔnho dze abɔ Jerusalɛm ho aprɔw."

column2: "Na asɔfo na Levifo no tseew hɔnho: na wɔtseew ɔman no
"Nna medze Juda mbapɔmba no fowee baa fasu no do
column3: na miyii ekuw akɛse ebien a wɔda ase na wɔtow santsen nantsew sisii hɔ; no mu kor faa enyimfa wɔ fasu no do ɔdze kɔ sumina kuropon no ano:"
na Juda mbapɔmba no mu fa na wodzi hɔn ekyir
column14: "na asɔfomba no mu binom dzedze mbɛn: Zekaria a ofi Jonatan

column10: na Hanani. Hɔn nna wɔdzedze Nyame nyimpa David ne nsanku adwontow ndzɛmba no; na kyerɛwfo Ezra dzi hɔn enyim:"

column7: mekyerɛ ɔdze kɔ nsu kuropon no nkyɛn boka afamu."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔda ase kuw kor no so sii mu kehyiaa hɔn
column3: nna mo so midzii hɔn ekyir
column6: dze kesi mfononoo abantsentsen no do
column7: mekyerɛ ɔdze kɔ fasu tɛtɛr no do;"

column5: na Hananel abantsentsen na Hamea abantsentsen no do araa dze kodu abobow a wɔfrɛ no Nguantsen Kuropon no ano: na wokegyinaa adaduafo dan kuropon no ano dzinn."

column2: "Nna hɔn a wɔda ase ekuw ebien no kegyinaa Nyankopɔn fi no mu
column4: na mpanyimfo no fa a wɔka mo ho no:"

column11: memaa hɔn ndze do ma wɔtsee."

column3: na hɔn enyi gyee; osiandɛ Nyankopɔn dze enyigye kɛse ama hɔn enyi agye; na mbaa na mbofra no so enyi gyee ma wɔtsee Jerusalɛm enyigye no ne nka wɔ ekyir noho ara."

column2: "Na da no ara na woyiyii mbarimba binom sisii akoradze
column5: na ebupɛn du du mpia no do
column6: dɛ wɔmboaboa kyɛfa a mbra no hyɛe dze maa asɔfo na Levifo no ano ngu mu
column7: osiandɛ Juda nyaa asɔfo na Levifo a wɔhyehyɛɛ hɔn no ho enyigye."

column4: na dɛmara so na adwontofo no na mbobowano ahwɛfo no so yɛe
column5: dɛ mbrɛ David na ne ba Solomon mbrasɛm no tse."

column2: "Osiandɛ tsetsefo David na Asaf nda mu
column4: na Nyankopɔn ayɛyi na ndaasema do etsitsir."
Israel nyinara memaa adwontofo na mbobowano ahwɛfo no kyɛfa
column5: dɛ mbrɛ da biara ɔsɛ: na wɔdze sii hɔ maa Levifo no; na Levifo no so wotui sii hɔ maa Aaronmba no."
